Class Trigger

java.lang.Object
dev.majek.advancements.trigger.Trigger
Direct Known Subclasses:
BredAnimalsTrigger, BrewedPotionTrigger, ChangedDimensionTrigger, ChanneledLightningTrigger, ConstructBeaconTrigger, ConsumeItemTrigger, CuredZombieVillagerTrigger, EffectsChangedTrigger, EnchantedItemTrigger, EnterBlockTrigger, EntityHurtPlayerTrigger, EntityKilledPlayerTrigger, FilledBucketTrigger, FishingRodHookedTrigger, HeroOfTheVillageTrigger, ImpossibleTrigger, InventoryChangedTrigger, ItemDurabilityChangedTrigger, KilledByCrossbowTrigger, LevitationTrigger, LocationTrigger, NetherTravelTrigger, PlacedBlockTrigger, PlayerHurtEntityTrigger, PlayerKilledEntityTrigger, RecipeUnlockedTrigger, ShotCrossbowTrigger, SleptInBedTrigger, SummonedEntityTrigger, TameAnimalTrigger, TickTrigger, UsedEnderEyeTrigger, UsedTotemTrigger, VillagerTradeTrigger, VoluntaryExileTrigger
public abstract class Trigger extends Object
A trigger of an advancement. Each advancement must have at least one trigger.
